name: BIAN Yatao Assistant Professor
research: He is dedicated to expanding the frontiers of AI capabilities in scientific intelligence, driving transformative technological advancements to address critical challenges in scientific research. Some of his research topics include reasoning-empowered foundation models, LLM/Agents for science, interpretable substructure-based robust graph learning, and energy-based learning.
prospective_students: He is currently looking for highly motivated postdocs, PhD students, visiting students, interns, and research assistants.
